rooms.description: Spacious entrance with a foyer to set the Bohemian theme. Includes decorative elements and vibrant colors.
Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and views. Bohemian decor with eclectic accents.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring ample storage and energy-efficient appliances.
Cozy guest bedroom designed to incorporate Bohemian style with vibrant textures and decorative pillows.
Spacious primary bedroom with a walk-in closet, floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, and a private balcony adhering to Vastu.
Largest bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, personalized Bohemian decor, incorporating natural materials and vibrant textiles.

openings.description: A large, inviting entrance door with a modern yet Bohemian design.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and enhancing the open-plan aesthetic.
